unnormalised: Arre yaar, trying to file my taxes is always a drama! They want my PAN card number, my GSTIN, and my bloody TAN number! It's like, chill, Income Tax dept, I'm just trying to do my civic duty, not launch a rocket. Next thing you know, they'll be asking for my Aadhar number, my driving license, and the serial number of my pressure cooker. At this rate, by 31/07, I'll just change my name and move to Goa. BTW, anyone know if Goa needs GSTIN for a shack? Asking for a friend!
normalised: Arre yaar, trying to file my taxes is always a drama! They want my P-A-N card number, my G-S-T-I-N, and my bloody T-A-N number! It's like, chill, Income Tax department, I'm just trying to do my civic duty, not launch a rocket. Next thing you know, they'll be asking for my Aadhar number, my driving license, and the serial number of my pressure cooker. At this rate, by thirty first july, I'll just change my name and move to Goa. By the way, anyone know if Goa needs G-S-T-I-N for a shack? Asking for a friend!
